title: Expanded AI Features
description: Deepen AI integration with Interactive Promos (player response vs AI retort) and Image Generation for dynamic wrestler portraits.

title: Fix AI settings overwrite on startup
description: The DataInitializer was overwriting database-persisted AI settings with environment defaults (false) on every startup. This caused configured AI providers to be disabled and LocalAI to be forced on as a fallback. Refactored syncAiSettingsFromEnvironment to only update settings if an environment variable is explicitly provided.
close_reason: Fixed by refactoring DataInitializer to respect existing database settings.

title: Enhance Match View narration with feedback-driven AI generation
description: In the Match View, players currently lack a 'Generate with feedback' box, unlike the Show Details Narration dialog. This feature is essential for allowing players to provide specific match context for AI narration. For player reporting, this should be the exclusive narration option.

title: Implement manifest-driven Docs-as-Code system
description: Automate game guide generation via E2E tests, VitePress build, and integration into the release workflow.
close_reason: Implemented docs-as-code system with automated screenshot capture, VitePress site generation, and CI/CD integration in release workflow.

title: Restrict Match View actions for non-campaign matches
description: On Match View the player has options to narrate and adjudicate matches. This should only be the case when a match is part of a campaign. Otherwise the player should only be able to set the segment winner(s) and save the narration since the booker will perform the AI narration and match adjudication later.
close_reason: Fixed Match View permissions, LazyInitializationException, and implemented E2E test foundation.

title: Multiplayer & League Features
description: Enable interaction between accounts. Features include a Draft Mode for Bookers to select wrestlers and Public Showcases for Viewers to see show histories.

title: Stability & Quality Hardening
description: Eliminate flaky tests and ensure the CI pipeline is bulletproof. Tasks include investigating DataIntegrityViolation in ShowDetailViewE2ETest, optimizing Selenium wait times, and adding unit tests for Campaign features.
close_reason: Completed Stability & Quality Hardening track. Fixed E2E flakiness, optimized CI build config, and added campaign unit tests.

title: Fix DataIntegrityViolation in ShowDetailViewE2ETest
description: Investigate and fix the Referential integrity constraint violation (FK_TITLE_REIGN_WON_AT_SEGMENT) occurring during segment deletion in E2E tests.

title: Optimize Selenium Wait Strategies
description: Review and refactor  to be more robust. Increase timeouts for Docker environments and handle stale element exceptions gracefully.

title: Add Unit Tests for Campaign Logic
description: Create unit tests for , , and  covering edge cases not hit by the happy-path E2E tests.

title: Configure Test Retries
description: Configure Maven Failsafe plugin to retry failed E2E tests once to mitigate transient infrastructure flakes.
